title: Help league keeps randomly freezing while im playing only for a few seconds.

embed.description: league of legends need help game freezes randomly in game and its the only game it does this to!!

body: league keeps freezing randomly in games.

replies.body: Installing new BIOS was able to help with those random freezes? Iiiiinteresting, sometimes the ol' pc just needs some updates/maintenance to run properly!
found the problem, if this happens to anyone else i had to install new BIOS.
